template.title: Events shown with custom HTML

property.title: Effect
property.helpText: Please select the effect that will be used to transition between items.

property.title: Speed
property.helpText: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (normal = 1000) or the Marquee Speed in a low to high scale (normal = 1)

property.title: Show items side by side?
property.helpText: Should items be shown side by side?

property.title: Items per page
property.helpText: If an effect has been selected, how many pages should we split the items across? If you don't enter anything here 1 item will be put on each page.

property.title: Date Format
property.helpText: The format to apply to all dates returned by the Widget.

property.title: Language
property.helpText: Select the language you would like to use.

property.title: Background Colour
property.helpText: The selected effect works best with a background colour. Optionally add one here.

property.title: Item Template
property.helpText: Enter text in the box below, used to display each article.

property.title: Snippets
property.helpText: Choose data type snippet

property.title: No data message
property.helpText: A message to display when no data is returned from the source

template.title: Daily Calendar - Light

property.title: This is an advanced template which may not work on devices with an older browser.
First hour slot
property.helpText: This view features a grid running from midnight to midnight. Use the first slot to shorten the time window shown.

property.title: Last hour slot
property.helpText: This view features a grid running from midnight to midnight. Use the last slot to shorten the time window shown.

property.title: Time Format
property.helpText: The format to apply to event time (default HH:mm).

property.title: Language
property.helpText: Select the language you would like to use.

property.title: Start at the current time?
property.helpText: Should the calendar start at the current time, or at the time of the first event?

property.title: Show now marker?
property.helpText: Should the calendar show a marker for the current time?

property.title: Text scale
property.helpText: Set the scale for the text element on the calendar.

property.title: Grid step
property.helpText: Duration, in minutes, for each row in the grid.

property.title: Use the colour pickers to override the element colours.
